text: An accounting application uses an RDS database configured with Multi-AZ deployments to improve availability. What would happen to RDS if the primary database instance fails?

answers.text: The canonical name record (CNAME) is switched from the primary to standby instance.
The primary database instance will reboot.
A new database instance is created in the standby Availability Zone.
The IP address of the primary DB instance is switched to the standby DB instance.
